Class DirectOffHeapMemory

java.lang.Object

      com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheap.DirectOffHeapMemory

 class DirectOffHeapMemory
extends OffHeapMemory

Implementation of OffHeapMemory using ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(int)

Author:
alexkasko Date: 1/14/13
